alert.note: Alert for Bingham; Bonneville (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 23 at 9:31PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Idaho, including the following counties, Bingham and Bonneville. * WHEN...Until 900 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 931 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in throughout Idaho Falls. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Idaho Falls, Ammon and Iona. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
